definition: to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
The Rape of Nanking (1997 documentary book by Iris Chang 張純如|张纯如)
pinyin: Nan2 jing1 Da4 tu2 sha1 Shi4 jian4

sentences.english: Khomeini’s regime responded with remarkable brutality, slaughtering thousands of the organization’s members.
sentences.chinese: 霍梅尼政权残忍的镇压游行，屠杀了几千名组织成员。

sentences.english: And sure enough, pogroms arise in places.
sentences.chinese: 很快各地出现了大屠杀。

sentences.english: An estimated 23,000 dolphins and porpoises are killed in Japan each year.
sentences.chinese: 据估计，日本每年有2万3千只海豚和小鲸被屠杀。

sentences.english: The fascists massacred those women and children in cold blood.
sentences.chinese: 法西斯分子惨无人道地屠杀了那些妇女儿童。

sentences.english: The colonists massacred thousands of natives with brutal and callous force.
sentences.chinese: 殖民者惨绝人寰地屠杀了成千的土著居民。

sentences.english: Devastators should be used to decimate infantry and attack units at very long ranges.
sentences.chinese: 毁灭战舰应该被用于远距离大批屠杀步兵和攻击单位。

sentences.english: This is one reason the corporate thuggery that is destroying the rainforests is so criminal.
sentences.chinese: 所以商业公司破坏雨林的屠杀是如此的罪恶。

sentences.english: Eventually fall joinville city, the people were massacred in the city, the Ming army on the sidelines is not saved.
sentences.chinese: 最终晋州城陷落，城内百姓惨遭屠杀，明军旁观不救。

sentences.english: The bloodbath or the death spiral?
Never think, the beauty of Ephraim village ahead already slaughtered by Japanese army, wash.
sentences.chinese: 却不曾想，前方的美莲村早已被日军屠杀血洗。

sentences.english: Memorial to the victims of genocide.
sentences.chinese: 种族大屠杀遇难者纪念碑。

sentences.english: Come on. You won't witness any slaughter. It's a movie.
sentences.chinese: 快别这么说，你没有目睹什么屠杀，这是一部电影。

sentences.english: Emotional antisemitism, he wrote, merely ended in pogroms.
sentences.chinese: 他写道，情感上的反犹太主义将以大屠杀而告终。

sentences.english: This massacre is one of the towering obscenities of other time.
sentences.chinese: 这次大屠杀是当今最令人发指的事件之一。

sentences.english: Grisly slayings brings Mexican drug war to US.
sentences.chinese: 恐怖的屠杀将毒品大战从墨西哥引向美国。

sentences.english: And hope is what Yad Vashem is all about!
sentences.chinese: 而盼望正是大屠杀纪念馆的主旨。

definition: to massacre everyone in a captured city
to be devoid of all humanity/inhuman/bestial
lit. not an inch of steel (idiom); unarmed and defenseless
